x-codeSamples.source:
#example from: https://chinlinlee.github.io/Burni/assets/FHIR/fhir-resource-examples/servicerequest-example.json
curl --location --request POST 'http://burni.example.com/fhir/ServiceRequest \' 
--header 'Content-Type: application/fhir+json' \
--data-raw '{"resourceType":"ServiceRequest","id":"b357bac8-7c81-4152-96cd-812b0ed7a193","status":"completed","intent":"order","category":[{"coding":[{"system":"http://snomed.info/sct","code":"103693007","display":"Diagnostic procedure (procedure)"}],"text":"Diagnostics Procedure"}],"code":{"coding":[{"system":"http://snomed.info/sct","code":"303653007","display":"Computed tomography of head"}]},"subject":{"reference":"Patient/example"},"meta":{"tag":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason","code":"HTEST","display":"test health data"}],"versionId":"1","lastUpdated":"2022-02-13T22:30:19.391+08:00"}}'
x-codeSamples.label: cURL
